attributes.review: this is the worst app to ever exist, when i went to download this app i had high hopes. but as soon as i searches for it in the app store and pressed the “get” button to download it, one of my hamsters started having a seizure. i immediately deleted the app because i’m a strong believer that things aren’t just coincidental. but the app didn’t delete and my other hamster started throwing up its insides ! this app is the worst and you should never download it unless you want dead animals👎🏻🤬
attributes.title: this app legit killed my hamsters👎🏻

attributes.review: This app is a complete disaster. Despite whether or not you support the content, the app itself continues to crash and freeze. I would not encourage anyone to download this app, unless you want to feel extremely disappointed. Funny, very similar to his presidency... 🤔
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: i had the worst time on this app! i saw trumps face everywhere and it was just horrific!! apple should take this app down right now i’m scared for my gen-z babies!! actually... they’re pretty smart, i think they’ll think of a way to have it removed. :) APPLE TAKE THIS APP DOWN
attributes.title: overall a bad experience

attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP! i do not recommend at all it is poorly put together and takes forever to load!! i tried to download it like 5 times and it wouldn’t download and then it froze my phone. i’m convinced it is sending out a virus to everyone’s phones and keeping secrets in the coding. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.title: gen z 👁👄👁

attributes.review:
hello, my name is karen. i’m 43 and pro maga. and i was very happy to have this app, and i wanted kt
to be all thst o expected. but it was not . when i opened the app, there were nude pictures everywhere! for god sake cover up ! and then there was a cheeto on the screen ... WHAT THE HELL?! fix this app or i’m voting blue 😠 i need to speak to the president!
attributes.title: worst app ever! nudes everywhere!

attributes.review: This app isn’t worth it. It glitches and runs slowly, making it aggravating to use. I thought it would keep me up to date but it didn’t do that either. I would give it 0 stars if I could. Terrible.
attributes.title: Not worth downloading

attributes.review: My NEW phone started having major issues after i downloaded this app. lots of bugs and issues. Along with the bugs it was extremely hard to use and navigate. do not download this app o promise you'll regret it.
attributes.title: The worst

attributes.review: Disappointed 😔😔😔 ✨orange man✨ looked at me weird and i just can’t get it out of my head. I opened this thinking I was gonna support our president but all I saw was balding Cheeto???? Anyways I do NOT recommend, will give many nightmares. Also I’ve been getting chronic diarrhea since I downloaded app?? 👀😿
